content: single_crochet 4 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 42 23 2 single_crochet 5 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 48 24 2 single_crochet 6 single_crochet increase x 6 4 single_crochet= 54 25-29 single_crochet in each st around place eyes between row 21 and 22 leaving 11 holes between them 1st eye is placed after the 2nd increase count 11 holes after the first eye and place the 2nd eye if you want the sunken eye look do not place the backs of the eyes on until row 33 tip you may have to adjust the eye placement depending on yarn and hook size you use 30 7 single_crochet decrease x 6= 48 31 single_crochet in each st around 32 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 42 33 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process sweet oddity art 3 head continued https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it 34 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 35 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 36 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 37 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 38 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 4 ears make 2 with color a 1 make 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 4 2 increase single_crochet x 2= 6 3 single_crochet in each st around do not stuff the ears 4 increase 2 single_crochet x 2= 8 5 single_crochet in each st around 6 increase 3 single_crochet x 2= 10 7-8 single_crochet in each st around 9 increase 4 single_crochet x 2= 12 10-11 single_crochet in each st around 12 increase 5 single_crochet x 2= 14 13-15 single_crochet in each st around fold the ears in half and single_crochet the opening closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 5 body with color a leave a long tail at the beginning of your magic_ring 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 5 blo single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet in each st around 7 increase x 3 18 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 8 2 single_crochet increase x 10= 40 9 4 single_crochet increase x 8= 48 10 single_crochet in each
